flawed_nl_solution:
Eustace's current age must be 39 years old - 3 years = <<39-3=40>>40 years old.
So Milford's current age must be 40 years old / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 years old.
So in 3 years, Milford will be 20 years old + 3 years = <<20+3=23>>23 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
